com.syndloanhub.loansum.pricer.facility.prorated

Class ProratedLoanTradePricer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.syndloanhub.loansum.pricer.facility.prorated.ProratedLoanTradePricer

  • public class ProratedLoanTradePricer
extends Object
    The methods associated to the pricing of a loan trade.

    This provides the ability to price ProratedLoanTrade.

                                                                                      double cleanPrice,
                                                                                      Optional<com.opengamma.strata.market.explain.ExplainMapBuilder> explainBuilder)
        Return the present value given a clean price. This amount is the sum of the proceeds of an offsetting trade settling on valuation date plus any accrued interest or fees. If the trade is unsettled, then we net with the expected proceeds of the trade itself.
